Title: Alma C. Wilson to Axel Holm 1948.4.28
Description:
BLÅPAPIR-KOPI AV ET MASKINSKREVET BREV FRA ALMA WILSON DATERT 28. APRIL – 1948, ANTAGELIG TIL AXEL HOLM.  INGEN KONVOLUTT.

CARBON COPY OF A TYPEWRITTEN LETTER FROM ALMA WILSON DATED APRIL 28 – 1948, PROBABLY TO AXEL HOLM.  NO ENVELOPE.
Creator: Alma C. Wilson
Siri Lawson, trans.
Text:
Dell Rapids. S.D.

April 28.48

Vi har sent brev til Stjørdals Banken som forlangt  De ingen pakker var sent til Gjertine Og Olava som det har veret til dere andre der. vilde john at dem skulde vere med nu. men han glemte at skrive demes navn med da han skrev. nu ser det ut for at det ska vere bare 4  Og Naar John Skrev til Eidum Hade han vel sin egen Aarsag  Det var ikke mig Den gangen.

Modtog Herborg Sit brev.  Hun faar vente til enan gang paa svar  Mor Og Jeg Har bege veret daarlig  Grace er bare daarlig.  Tror hendes arbeids dage er forbi

Hilsen til dere ale.

Fra Alma

Dell Rapids. S.D.

April 28.48

We have sent a letter to Stjørdals Banken as demanded  As no packages were sent to Gjertine And Olava like there has been to the rest of you there. john wanted them to be included now. but he forgot to write their names on when he wrote.  Now it looks like there’s only supposed to be 4  And when John Wrote to Eidum I guess he Had his own Reasons  It wasn’t me That time.

Received Herborg’s letter.  She’ll have to wait until another time for a reply  Mother And I Have both been sick  Grace is not well.  I think her working days are over

Regards to you all.

From Alma
